#summary How to use the Lasso tool and other selection tricks.

= Lasso =

You can use this tool to freehand select areas in the following way:

  # Press with the left mouse button.
  # Drag the mouse to select an area.
  # Release the left mouse button.

== Note ==

When selecting an area, the Lasso tool will appear as a line using the current selected [ForegroundColor foreground color].

== Cancel ==

You can cancel the operation pressing the right button before you release the left one (or vice versa if you start the process using the right button).

==Keyboard Shortcut==
`Q`
